      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CustomerManager.addCustomerTransactions(Customer target, CustomerTransaction cust)
      This method adds a new transaction to an existing Customer's history.
      void Customer.addTransaction(CustomerTransaction cust)
      This method adds a new transaction to the Customer's history
      void CustomerManager.createCustomer(CustomerTransaction cust)
      This method creates a new Customer (when a booking is made and Customer does not exist) and adds it into the list of existing Customers.

      Make payments according to CustomerTransaction and type of cinema.
      void CustomerManager.update(CustomerTransaction cust)
      The update method checks if a Customer exists, and if so, adds the transaction to the Customer's transaction history.
      void BookingManager.updateBookings(CustomerTransaction cust)
      Add new CustomerTransaction to list of transactions
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type CustomerTransaction

      Constructor parameters in <Unnamed> with type arguments of type CustomerTransaction 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerManager(java.util.List<CustomerTransaction> bookings)
